nodes.text: The Ghrag Mercenaries Base was a space station hidden in the Tyyyn Nebula in the Kashyyyk system. It was used by the Ghrag Mercenaries at the time of the Galactic Civil War. Ghrag starfighters attacked anyone who dared to fly too close to the station.

The Ghrag Mercenaries Base was a location in Rage of the Wookiees, the second expansion for Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. It could be found in the Kashyyyk system.
The base looked like the wreck of a C-9979 landing craft.
